Class HalMediaType

java.lang.Object

      org.multibit.mbm.api.hal.HalMediaType

public class HalMediaType
extends javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType

Additional media types to provide the following to resource endpoints:

  • Provision of HAL identifier

Since:
0.0.1
